body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Lewis and the customer's name is Natalie Mitchell.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Michael Lewis, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How are you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Michael. I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed with everything happening right now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Natalie. It can be a lot sometimes. May I have your name so I can assist you better?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Natalie. Can you tell me which motorcycle model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m looking at the Thunderbolt model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! That model is really popular. Can I also get your zip code to check for any local promotions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! One two three four five. One more thing, could I have your phone number for further contact?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Natalie. I appreciate your time today! If you have any other questions, don’t hesitate to reach out.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Michael! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day, and enjoy your motorcycle journey!
